NowSleeping: {0}/{1} people sleeping {2} still needed to pass the night
CMDSleepPrecentage:
/twl config SleepPrecentage [int] to set the Sleep precentage
/twl config SleepPrecentage to show value
Not_Server: The command is only for usage with the server.
CMDDisableSleeping:
/twl config DisableSleeping [true/false] to enable/disable sleeping
/twl config DisableSleeping to show value
NotBoolean: The value must be a true or false
